Best experience at Q&M Paya Lebar Quarter (PLQ ), good customer service, good follow up plus doctor üë©‚Äç‚öïÔ∏è is young and experience. Big compliments for Dr. Emma Chin, Marry & Juliet. All staffs are bonded and friendly environment. The clinic is so clean too and a comfy sofa.

Try it yourself here. I‚Äôll definite visit for regular teeth cleaning.

Btw, I removed 2 teeth‚Äôs at the same time and one of it is wisdom tooth ü¶∑ and today I‚Äôm here to remove the stitches üòÖ

The first ever dentist who cannot tell the overall condition of my teeth without an xray. Kept insisting on an xray when I told her I don't need it. I'm just there for general cleaning and polishing. When I asked about how my teeth were looking overall, she said I can't tell without an xray. All the dentists that I been to were able to give me some good advise. You can tell that the dentist just wanted me to spend more on unnecessary xrays.

I have been coming here for over 2 years now and am extremely satisfied with the service here. You will be in great hands with Dr Emma, along with assistant Juliet and greeted by Mary. Thoroughly enjoyed my experience here and I‚Äôm sure you will too.

Did my dental check up with dr tan Su wee
She was exceptionally efficient and very patient
Would definitely recommend her to family and friends and will be back!

I had my temp crown broken into pieces while waiting for my perm crown, not once but twice! üò¨ I called Q and M Paya Lebar for help to get the temp crown fixed and both times I've been treated so professionally and kindly by Dr Jessica and her assistant, and to Mary at the reception for all their kindness and understanding. They helped fit me in for emergency appointment even with their tight schedule, I'm so touched with the level of service. Keep it up ladies!! ‚ô•Ô∏è
